item.title: WLFI: The token's initial circulating supply is 24.669 billion.
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, World Liberty Financial announced that the initial circulating supply of the WLFI token is 24,669,070,265 tokens. The distribution of the token supply is as follows:10,000,000,000 tokens are allocated to the unlocked ecological part of World Liberty Financial, Inc.7,783,585,650 tokens are allocated to Alt5 Sigma Corporation as part of its treasury strategy, accounting for approximately 8% of the total supply of WLFI.2,880,884,615 tokens are designated for liquidity and market promotion to support the Initial Exchange Offering (IEO).4,004,600,000 tokens are allocated to public sale participants, representing 20% that is initially unlocked at the time of issuance.

item.title: WLFI Deletes Blog Post on "Clarification of Token Initial Circulating Supply"
item.description: On September 1st, according to the official website, WLFI has removed the previously posted blog article regarding the initial circulation supply of the token.

item.title: 「Bitcoin Bro」 Huang Licheng Adds 800 ETH to Long Position, Total Position Size Exceeds $1.15 Billion
item.description: On September 1st, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, the "Whale Brother" had an increase of 800 ETH long positions (approximately $2.45 million), with a position size of around $116 million. Currently, it is experiencing an unrealized loss of $1.88 million, and the liquidation price is now $3,142.

item.title: Binance Wallet Pieverse First Phase Booster Event Launched, with a Participation Requirement of 61 Alpha Points
item.description: On September 1st, according to official information, Binance Wallet announced that the first stage of the Pieverse Booster event has commenced. During this event, 30 million PIEVERSE tokens will be distributed as rewards through airdrops. The participation requirement is that users need to have 61 Alpha points or more. In the first stage of the event, users can share 7.5 million PIEVERSE tokens as airdrop rewards.Binance Wallet stated that the reward tokens for this event have a lock-up period, and the unlocking date will be determined by the project team and may not be disclosed in advance.

item.title: Binance will list BFUSD/USDC, NMR/USDC, and QTUM/USDC spot trading pairs
item.description: On September 1st, according to official information, Binance announced that it will list the trading pairs of BFUSD/USDC, NMR/USDC, and QTUM/USDC for spot trading on September 2, 2025, at 16:00 (UTC+8).In addition, Binance will start trading bot services for the following trading pairs at 16:00 (UTC+8) on September 2, 2025:Spot Algo Orders: BFUSD/USDC, NMR/USDC, and QTUM/USDC.

item.title: A whale deposited 10.19 million USDC into Hyperliquid and shorted WLFI with 3x leverage
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 10.19 million USDC into Hyperliquid and initiated a WLFI short position with a leverage of 3x. Currently, there are still outstanding orders, and the whale intends to further expand this position.

item.title: Binance: AIO Trading Now Limited to Sell Orders Only Due to Security Vulnerability in Project Team's Multi-Signature Wallet
item.description: September 1st. As per official information, Binance has declared that, due to user security considerations, AIO trading is currently restricted to sell orders only because the project team's multi-signature wallet has encountered a security vulnerability.

item.title: Former Cred CEO Sentenced to 52 Months in Prison for $150 Million Cryptocurrency Fraud
item.description: On September 1st, as per the report by Decrypt, a federal judge imposed a combined prison term of nearly eight years on two former executives of the bankrupt crypto lending firm Cred. Their actions resulted in one of the largest investor losses in the history of the crypto industry. Legal experts assert that this ruling establishes a new precedent for holding executives accountable in cases of crypto fraud.The former CEO and co-founder of Cred LLC, Daniel Schatt, was sentenced to 52 months in federal prison, while the company's CFO, Joseph Podulka, was given a 36-month sentence.

item.title: Quack AI has released the Q Tokenomics, with an airdrop allocation of 12%.
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, the AI-driven governance protocol Quack AI announced its Q tokenomics. The total token supply is 10 billion. Among them, 10% is allocated to the core team, 11% to investors and advisors, and 79% to the community and ecosystem. The specific breakdown is as follows: Community - 30%; Ecosystem and Partners - 15%; Airdrop - 12%; Project Treasury - 11%; Marketing and Growth - 6%; Liquidity - 5%. The initial circulating supply of Q is 16.16%.

item.title: Data: WLFI Total On-chain Holdings Surpass $900 Million
item.description: On September 1st, based on Coinglass data, the current total value locked in WLFI contracts has reached $9.02 billion. When calculated in terms of token value, this amounts to a total of 2.8 billion WLFI tokens, with a 22.99% increase in the past 24 hours.
